com.esri.mo2.map.core
Interface ScaleBar

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseScaleBar
public interface ScaleBar
extends Cloneable

ScaleBar interface defines a set of methods to draw a ScaleBar to a given graphic context and getter/setter methods for accessing the properties of a ScaleBar objects.

setScaleUnit

public void setScaleUnit(int unit)
set the scale unit, it is one of constants defined in the class (com.esri.mo2.util.Units)

Parameters:
unit - one of constants from com.esri.mo2.util.Units(FEET, METERS, MILES, KILOMETERS)
